trip_plan.day_plan_text: Your first day in Paris begins with an artistic immersion at the Louvre Museum, home to masterpieces like the Mona Lisa. After exploring its vast collection, enjoy a leisurely stroll through the adjacent Tuileries Garden. The day concludes with a visit to the iconic Eiffel Tower, where you can see the city sparkle at night.
trip_plan.day_plan_sequence: visit(Louvre Museum), walk(Tuileries Garden), view(Eiffel Tower at night)
trip_plan.image_prompt: An elegant, cinematic, wide-angle photo of the Louvre Museum at dusk. The glass pyramid is illuminated from within, casting a warm, golden glow. The sky is a deep twilight blue, and the classic Parisian architecture of the palace is visible in the background. The courtyard is wet, reflecting the lights. Style of a modern travel magazine cover.
trip_plan.audio_script: Welcome to Paris! Today, we'll marvel at the Mona Lisa in the Louvre, wander through the beautiful Tuileries Garden, and watch the Eiffel Tower light up the night sky. An unforgettable start!

trip_plan.day_plan_text: Start your second day with a scenic river cruise along the Seine, offering a unique perspective on Paris's landmarks. Disembark near the Notre-Dame Cathedral and explore the Île de la Cité. Visit the Sainte-Chapelle, renowned for its stunning stained glass windows. End your day with a dinner at a classic Parisian bistro.
trip_plan.day_plan_sequence: cruise(Seine River), visit(Notre-Dame Cathedral), visit(Sainte-Chapelle), dine(Parisian bistro)
trip_plan.image_prompt: A serene, misty morning view of the Seine River with the Notre-Dame Cathedral in the background. The sunlight filters through the fog, casting a soft, ethereal glow. A river cruise boat glides smoothly on the water. Style of an impressionist painting.
trip_plan.audio_script: Today, we'll sail along the Seine, discover the historic Île de la Cité, and enjoy the breathtaking beauty of Sainte-Chapelle. Savor the Parisian ambiance!

trip_plan.day_plan_text: On your final day, visit the Montmartre district, known for its bohemian vibe and historic significance. Explore the narrow streets, visit the Sacré-Cœur Basilica, and enjoy panoramic views of the city from its steps. Conclude your trip with a shopping spree along the famous Champs-Élysées.
trip_plan.image_prompt: A vibrant, colorful scene capturing the charming streets of Montmartre. Artists display their work, and people stroll through the cobblestone alleys. The white Sacré-Cœur Basilica stands majestically in the background, under a clear blue sky. Style of a lively travel blog.
trip_plan.audio_script: Our last day in Paris is a treat! We'll wander through Montmartre's charming streets, visit the beautiful Sacré-Cœur, and end with a glamorous shopping experience on the Champs-Élysées. Au revoir, Paris!
